hero_subtitle: Stop guessing. Start growing. Our AI analyzes your skills against live market data to give you a precise, actionable roadmap to your dream tech job.
feature_analysis_desc: Upload your resume and get an instant, brutally honest breakdown of where you stand.
feature_ai_desc: Stuck on a concept? Need interview prep? Your personal AI mentor is available 24/7.
feature_roadmap_desc: We don't just tell you what's wrong. We give you a step-by-step plan to fix it.
about_headline: Bridging the Gap to Your Dream Career
about_subheadline: SkillGap Analyzer leverages advanced AI to map your unique professional DNA against industry standards, giving you a clear roadmap to success.
precision_analysis_desc: We don't guess. Our AI analyzes thousands of job descriptions to understand exactly what the market demands right now.
accelerated_growth_desc: Stop wasting time on irrelevant skills. Focus on the high-impact gaps that stand between you and your next promotion.
unbiased_feedback_desc: Get objective, data-driven insights into your capabilities. No sugar-coating, just actionable reality.
how_it_works_desc: It starts with your resume. We parse your professional history and screen it against top-tier requirements. Then, our interactive assessment engine verifies your claimed skills through adaptive testing. The result is a comprehensive Gap Analysis Report‚Äîyour personal blueprint for career acceleration.
auth_sign_in_subtitle: Sign in to continue your career journey.
auth_join_us: Join us to accelerate your growth
footer_text: SkillGap Analyzer ¬© 2024. Empowering careers with AI.
analyze_subtitle: Search for any job role and upload your resume to get started
set_custom_role: Click to set as custom role
insight_text: We found <1>{{count}} matching skills</1> in your profile, but identified <3>{{gapCount}} key gaps</3> for this {{category}} role.
verify_skills_desc: We can generate a <1>custom assessment</1> based on your resume to verify if you truly know these skills. This helps identify "fake" vs "real" strengths.
gemini_crafting: Gemini AI is crafting unique, deep-dive questions for your profile...

profile_strong: Your profile is strong! Focus on advanced system design.
